sentences.en: He was bargaining with the salesman.
sentences.cn: 他在与销售员讨价还价.

sentences.en: He worked as a door-to-door salesman peddling cloths and brushes.
sentences.cn: 他的工作是上门推销抹布和刷子。

sentences.en: That salesman is a real crook.
The buyer was convinced of the salesman's integrity.
sentences.cn: 买主深信销售员的诚实.

sentences.en: The company's salesman has been caroling its glories for many years.
sentences.cn: 公司的推销员多少年来都在歌颂公司的辉煌成就.

sentences.en: The salesman brought some samples of his firm's products.
sentences.cn: 推销员带来了一些他公司的产品货样.

sentences.en: The salesman can get commission on everything he sells.
sentences.cn: 这个售货员能得到所售每件货物的佣金.

sentences.en: The salesman got a ＄50 commission for every car he sold.
sentences.cn: 这个推销员每销售一辆汽车得到50美元的回扣.

sentences.en: The salesman hurried the customer to make a choice.
sentences.cn: 售货员催促顾客赶快做出选择.

sentences.en: The salesman is still persisting with his demands.
sentences.cn: 那店员仍在坚持他的要求.

sentences.en: The salesman proclaimed that his tonic would cure all diseases.
sentences.cn: 推销员宣称他的滋补品将治愈所有的病.

sentences.en: The salesman sorted his new consignment of stockings.
sentences.cn: 推销员把新到的一批长袜清理分类.

sentences.en: The salesman will call back at any house he missed.
sentences.cn: 那个推销员将重访他所错过的每所房子.

sentences.en: We felt the salesman's synthetic friendliness.
sentences.cn: 我们感觉到那位销售员的虚情假意.

phrases.tran_cn: 旅行商问题；货郎担问题

trans.tran_en: a man whose job is to persuade people to buy his company’s products
